```{r}
  library(shinydashboard)
  library(shiny)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(stringr)
  library(readxl)
```


```{r}
header <- dashboardHeader(
  title = "My Dashboard"
)

sidebar <- dashboardSidebar(
  sidebarMenuOutput("menu"),
  sidebarMenuOutput("select_genotype")
)

body <- dashboardBody(
  tabItems(
    tabItem(tabName = "dashbord",
        h2("Dashboard tab content")
    )
  )
)

ui <- dashboardPage(header, sidebar, body)
server <- function(input, output, session){
  output$menu <- renderMenu({
    sidebarMenu(
      menuItem("Menu item", icon = icon("dashboard"))
    )
  })
  output$select_genotype <- renderMenu({
    sidebarMenu(sidebarSearchForm())
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
